title: Is the Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro water resistant? - Quora

response.answer_text: Redmi Note 9 Pro isn't water-resistant. But the phone has p2i nano-coating to make it splashproof. Redmi Note 9 Pro Key Specs 6.67 inch (1080x2400 pixels) displayAndroid v10.0Qualcomm Snapdragon 720G Processor4GB RAM64GB storage, 512GB Expandable48+8+5+2 MP Camera16 MP Selfie Camera5020mAh battery
Not resistant …it just has a water repellent coating which should help save from some splashes. It won't survive and submerging though.
